column1: Policeman: Good evening Detective. Glad you could make it at this hour.
column2: Detective: Why is it always me who is called up on times like these...
column3: Detective: I was in the middle of my good night's rest.
column4: Policeman: I apologise but the matter is urgent.
column6: Detective: Let's crack on with this shall we.
column7: Policeman: Here are your files, sir.
column8: Detective: Thank you. Let's take a look.
